name: ecoDUSTRIAL™ Traditional Coatings
description: ecoDUSTRIAL™ Traditional Coatings are non-porous, pH neutral, and will stand up to harsh weather and UV exposure. These extremely durable finishes are resistant to chipping, peeling, chalking, and cracking, and they retain flexibility even at low temperatures. It cure in seconds, not days or weeks, as with other industrial coatings. The finish is suitable for wet or dry locations, and can be applied on concrete, fiberglass, and metal substrates at installation speeds up to 800 square feet per hour. ecoDUSTRIAL™ Traditional Coatings provide the durable, long lasting coating solution your project demands.
